item.title: Delete Orphaned Categories in Outlook for Mac
item.description:
During our latest Office365 mailbox migration projects we had an increasing number of Outlook for Mac users complaining about some categories in Outlook that they were unable to delete. We couldn’t find these categories using PowerShell

Get-MessageCategory -Mailbox jdoe

and the categories also didn’t show up in OWA or on any Outlook for Windows Client. Creating a new Outlook profile also didn’t solve the issue.

Manual approach

After some digging around we noticed that we were able to delete the category the following way

Create a new category with the name of the category you...

item.title: Exchange Connection Manager 2.0
item.description:
Exchange Connection Manager 2.0

The new release finally adds support for Powershell Core‼️ You can now use ECM on basically any platform like macOS, Linux and even iOS using Azure Cloud Shell.

About

Are you an Exchange Admin? Are you managing multiple Exchange OnPrem and Online environments? Tired of switching between multiple shells and sessions, updating and entering credentials? Check out the PowerShell Exchange Connection Manager module.

Note

Due to „limitations“ of the secure string CMDlets in PS Core, ECM on PS Core generates a random encryption key after installation to handle your saved credentials. If you‘re...

item.title: Unable to start Microsoft Teams Client for Mac – Error Code 300
item.description:
A couple of users recently had in issue opening the MS Teams Client application on macOS.

After they have started the client, Teams prompted for a new sign in, but after a click on the login button the client forced a restart of the app. Even uninstalling and removing all app preferences (who knows if they really cleared all preferences) didn’t solve the problem.

However, the solution was pretty simple.

  • Start the app
  • Right click on the app icon
  • Choose Log out
  • Sign back in

this worked for the following error codes.

  • Error Code...
